price: নিশ্চয় ইয়াত আছে ইবাদতকাৰী সম্প্ৰদায়ৰ বাবে পৰ্যাপ্ত বিষয়বস্তু।
arabic: إِنَّ فِي هَٰذَا لَبَلَٰغٗا لِّقَوۡمٍ عَٰبِدِينَ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: inna fī hādhā labalāghan liqawmin ʿābidīna
